info.name: Gmail Inbox alt Contrasting
info.description:
Near stock alternative read/unread/hover contrasting for default Gmail styles.
Read mail has a gray inactive color near the mail tabs with black important text.
Unread mail has an off white subdued with black important text.
Hover is a light blue/gray variant with off white text important.
info.additionalInfo:
V1.0
Thanks to many others who have done other Gmail contrasting that inspired me do my own coding.
